body.name: COMMERCIAL CHEF 1.4 Cubic Foot Microwave with 10 Power Levels, Small Microwave with Push Button, 1100 Watt Microwave with Digital Control Panels, Countertop Microwave with Timer, Stainless Steel
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 8 hrs 7 mins
features: Powerful: When it comes to microwave ovens, our COMMERCIAL CHEF 1100 watt microwave (37.5 lbs.) is your solution to fast & delicious food. Microwave bacon, microwave popcorn, & other tasty favorites!
10 Power Levels: Our compact microwave (21.8" x 17.6" x 12.3") has 10 outstanding heating settings, including Speed & Weight Defrost and 6 Preset Menu options.
Digital Control: Heat from 30 seconds to 99 minutes with easy-to-operate digital controls. This countertop microwave has an accurate timer signal when complete. Heat & reheat for the whole family!
Features: When it comes to countertop microwave ovens, our stainless steel microwave cooker is 1100 watt with a convenient push button child lock, turntable, & 1.4 cu. ft. capacity.
Grab and Go: This small microwave allows you to heat meals, snacks, and drinks so fast to accommodate your busy life. Our microwave oven helps you can enjoy delicious food without wasting time.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our countertop microwave has power levels total, including a pre-set menu for common foods like popcorn, general warming, and more.

This microwave comes with a glass tray, turntable roller, shaft, and wave guide. A push button door lock safety system ensures your microwave door remains safely shut while heating and reheating meals, dishes and beverages.

Your new COMMERCIAL CHEF 1.4 cu. ft. compact microwave will look beautiful in your kitchen thanks to its timeless and stylish stainless steel in black housing design. Store your stainless steelmicrowave conveniently in kitchens to heat up delicious foods.

Product Specifications Interior oven capacity of 1.4 cubic feet1100W | 120V/60HzUnit dimensions of (21.8" x 17.6" x 12.3" | Unit weight of 37.5 lbs.10 Cooking power levelsEfficient microwave turntable Quickly Heat up Meals & Drinks Coffee, tea, hot cocoaBreakfast oatmeal, eggs & baconPre-made mealsFully cook regular & sweet potatoesChicken, fish, pasta dishes and more!

Is this microwave portable and cordless? Our COMMERCIAL CHEF 1.4 cu. ft. microwave is not cordless and is equipped with a 3-wire cord and 3-prong grounding plug. You may use your new microwave in a variety of indoor settings, but only on flat stable surfaces. How many power levels does the microwave include? Our countertop microwave has easy-to-operate digital control panels with 10 power level selections. Additionally, you can select a pre-set menu for popcorn, warming, and other common selections. What’s the difference between Weight Defrost & Time Defrost? Our microwave’s Weight Defrost Function works by inputting your food’s weight, which will defrost accordingly; Time Defrost will defrost meat, soups, stews, and other foods solely by inputting your preferred time. Should you stir your food occasionally while microwaving it? Stir foods such as casseroles and vegetables while cooking to distribute heat evenly. Food at the outside of the dish absorbs more energy and heats more quickly, so stir from the outside to the center.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not what expected
reviews.reviewText: Microwave itself seems to work alright, it's very big inside and can hold a lot. My only complaint is that it arrived dented on the corner backside, most likely from mishandling during shipping. The dent can be hidden if pushed back against the wall so I decided not to return it. It works great and is pretty easy to use. I appreciate that it's quiet. My last microwave was extremely loud. Note that the digital display light color is blue not green as shown in photos. I don't care for the blue but I realize most appliances are made like this now. Hoping for the best.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars it's white -- all white, even the screen.
reviews.reviewText: Appears to be a top notch mirco wave. Unfortunately, it was damaged upon arrival. Being a mircowave, I did not want to chance any leakage so I am returning it for a replacement model. Thank you. Sally Schmidt

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It has a turntable inside
reviews.reviewText: So far I like this oven. I hope to get many years of use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Rusted out in less than 2 years.
reviews.reviewText: Needed a typical countertop microwave, this one had some fabulous reviews & was inexpensive.Problem: Rust inside after several months (I'd noticed A LOT of moisture inside after using the microwave, I've never had that occur in any microwave) that encompassed the bottom front panel and the edges where the bottom meets the sides. Especially in the rear. We kept it very clean - upon the last wipe down (we tossed it at that time,) the rear panel bowed outward with a slight pressure of cleaning. In less than two years, this microwave was peppered with extensive interior rust and the rear wall was very flimsy. I've never encountered rust in a microwave.Another peeve: You cannot view the food through the window (important when making a roux!)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Large cooking space. Cuts cooking time in half!
reviews.reviewText: Lots of space in this commercial countertop microwave. So happy with this purchase! Saving precious minutes is wonderful!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice microwave. Not as sturdy as I'd hoped and electrical cord is way too short. Otherwise it's okay.
